history.proof: intros d m0 m1 a b H. unfold lemd in *. destruct H as [H1 [H2 H3]]. split. + srun best use: map_replace_def_ok_d. + split. - srun best use: map_replace_def_ok_d. - apply prec_list_ind. * sfirstorder depth: 3. * srun best use: map_replace_inc. * sfirstorder depth: 3.

ctx: intros d m0 m1 a b H.
intros d m0 m1 a b H.
exceptions.exn: In environment d : preDTA m0, m1 : Map bool a : ad b : bool H1 : ensemble_base state d m0 H2 : ensemble_base state d m1 H3 : lem m0 m1 Unable to unify "ensemble_base state d m0" with "ensemble_base state d (map_replace bool m0 a b)".

ctx: intros d m0 m1 a b H.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros d m0 m1 a b H. unfold lemd in *. intros H0. destruct H as [H1 [H2 H3]]. split. + apply H1. + split. - apply H2. - apply H in H0. apply H0.
